ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] 1HS vs 2HS
ygData.msgSnippet: Think about it this way.... Both SK and pally epics are 2HS.  So it s good to keep that skill maxed Yet, pallies get Bash.  In order to use Bash you have to
ygData.messageBody:
Think about it this way....
 
Both SK and pally epics are 2HS.  So it's good to keep that skill maxed
 
Yet, pallies get Bash.  In order to use Bash you have to carry a shield, in which case 2HS is not possible.  So it's good to keep 1HS up.
 
SK's I think get a similar ability, or maybe even Bash, but I dont play a SK so I dont know for sure.  But 1HS is also important to SK.
 
On the other hand, pallies and SK's usually work as pullers in groups, so they have to have good Taunting abilities, and sometimes weapons they have can help with taunt by doing more damage.  Go with the weapon that helps with that regardless of 1Hs or 2HS.
 
Just my two cents. 
 
Wulfric
 
 
 
 
 
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Greg
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, November 05, 2004 7:36 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] 1HS vs 2HS


Greetings....

I have been playing EQ for a long time, played nearly every class
with most races. I feel I am knowledgeable about many things in
regards to each class, race, etc. Yet, there is the one question
that evades me.. For the "Knight" classes, (Shadowknights and
Paladins), what is better..the traditional 1hs or the 2hs. I have
seen people, including my friends who do 2hs, and some that do 1hs.
What are the pros and cons of each...so I can decide which way to go
with my new pally...

thanks
